tool_description: This project is a Python Library for retrieving UFC fighter stats. It scrapes data from the official UFC website. You can query for a fighter's stats by providing their first and last name.
name: UFC_Fighter_stats
title: UFC_Fighter_stats

api_list.name: fighter stats
api_list.description: this will give you the stats of the fighter that you specify

api_list.name: ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc_fighter_stats.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc_fighter_stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc_fighter_stats.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc_fighter_stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
